title: Stephen Graham Jones
summary: Stephen Graham Jones (born January 22, 1972) is a Blackfoot Native American author of experimental fiction, horror fiction, crime fiction, and science fiction. He has published "25 or 30 or so books". 31.5 linear feet of works written by or related to him are held in the Sowell Family Collection in Literature, Community, and the Natural World, part of the Southwest Collection/Special Collections Library at Texas Tech University.He is currently the Ivena Baldwin professor of English at the University of Colorado Boulder.
